document.heading: Margaret Peters and Roumania Peters Walker Tennis Courts Designation Act of 2015
To designate the tennis courts at Rose Park, located at 2600 O Street, N.W., in Ward 2, as the Margaret Peters and Roumania Peters Walker Tennis Courts.

history.summary: Law 21-31 designates the tennis courts at Rose Park, located in Ward 2 at 2600 O Street, N.W. as the Margaret Peters and Roumania Peters Walker Tennis Courts.

document.text: BE IT ENACTED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA, That this act may be cited as the "Margaret Peters and Roumania Peters Walker Tennis Courts Designation Act of 2015".

section.text: Pursuant to section 401 of the Street and Alley Closing and Acquisition Procedures Act of 1982, effective March 10, 1983 (D.C. Law 4-201; D.C. Official Code ยง 9-204.01) ("Act"), and notwithstanding the requirements of section 407 of the Act (D.C. Official Code 9-204.07), the Council designates the tennis courts at Rose Park, located at 2600 O Street, N.W., in Ward 2, as the "Margaret Peters and Roumania Peters Walker Tennis Courts".

section.heading: Transmittal.
section.text: The Council shall transmit a copy of this act, upon its effective date, to the Director of the Department of Parks and Recreation.

section.heading: Fiscal impact statement.
section.text: The Council adopts the fiscal impact statement in the committee report as the fiscal impact statement required by section 602(c)(3) of the District of Columbia Home Rule Act, approved December 24, 1973 (87 Stat. 813; D.C. Official Code ยง1-206.02(c)(3)).

section.heading: Effective date.
section.text: This act shall take effect following approval by the Mayor (or in the event of veto by the Mayor, action by the Council to override the veto), a 30-day period of congressional review as provided in section 602(c)(1) of the District of Columbia Home Rule Act, approved December 24, 1973 (87 Stat. 813; D.C. Official Code ยง1-206.02(c)(1)), and publication in the District of Columbia Register.
